titleStmt.title: A description of the grand signour's seraglio or Turkish emperours court [edited] by John Greaves.
titleStmt.author: Bon, Ottaviano, 1552-1623.
Withers, Robert.
Greaves, John, 1602-1652.

notesStmt.note: Running title: The grand signors seraglio.

"The work of Mr. Robert Withers"--Dedication. Actually the work of Ottaviano Bon, translated by Withers and edited by John Greaves--Cambridge bibliography of English literature Cambridge [Eng.], 1969, v. 1, p. 779.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
